MemeDef.label: Sloadic ways
MemeDef.description: The way Sload manipulate life, to spread disease, and raise thralls, is something only a godlike being should be able to do. As such, they should be revered.

creation(tag=meme_Bonewalker) ->While [deity0_name] cares for us, [deity0_pronoun] made sure we did not grow soft. [deity0_name] made our flesh weak, and our bones brittle, but also made our minds, and our hands.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Bonewalker) ->Using the knowledge bestowed upon us by [deity0_name], we reshaped the flesh and bone of the dead into our new guardians.

intro(tag=meme_Bonewalker) ->After a long pilgrimage, we happened upon [place_summary] [place_name], our new home. Shortly after erecting our homes, [foeLeader] attacked us. Many were lost, it was made clear how frail our bodies are. But [deity0_name] came to use, and granted us the knowledge we needed.
conflict(tag=meme_Bonewalker) ->[foeLeader] forced us into the tombs, unaware of the knowledge [deity0_name] granted us.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Bonewalker) ->[founderName] used our newfound knowledge, and built the first of our new guardians.

victory(tag=meme_Bonewalker) ->Using the bonewalkers created by [founderName], we reclaimed our new homeland. [founderName] fought with honour besides our creations, but was lost to a fatal blow. We readied the forge, so that [founderName] would always be with us.
setup(tag=meme_Bonewalker) ->[founderName] in an attempt to overthrow [foeLeader], began to experiment with the flesh of the dead.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Bonewalker) ->Using the knowledge gained, [founderName] built an army of bonewalkers, and ended [foeLeader]'s reign of terror.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Bonewalker) ->I visited the reclusive doctor of my village, one who most avoided, in an effort to bring back those I care about.
lesson(tag=meme_Bonewalker) ->living flesh may be weak, but the dead feel no pain
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Bonewalker) ->The dead are everywhere, all they need is a body to inhabit.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Bonewalker) ->The spirits seek out the flesh of the living, but are unable to find suitable vessels.
animistFact(tag=meme_Bonewalker) ->We must construct the vessels, pure and strong, made of bone and flesh.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Bonewalker) ->[itIsSaid] those that provide the spirits vessels, will in turn be provided with untold knowledge.
